summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HANA Organic Skincare - Organic/Vegan Lavender Grains Facial Cleanser + Exfoliator
Review Date: 2015/07/11
Store: HANA Organic Skincare
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'HANA Organic Skincare', 'Item Form': 'Grain', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709431672'}
Review Text: Very gentle but effective! I love beauty products that are natural and non- irritating (a must for sensitive skin!). This mixes into the paste well and doesn't clump. Also, it rinses well and leaves no residue on the skin. However, my only wish is it came in other scents. While I like lavender, and lavender as an ingredient, its not one of my favorite scents. Overall though this works really well (especially on combination skin).
Review Title: Very gentle, works good!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Worker B - Organic Dawn Facial Serum (Morning Serum)
Review Date: 2015/10/08
Store: Worker B
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 4.64 Ounces'}
Review Text: I'm reviewing both the Night and Day Serums as they seem to work best in conjunction ( Obviously). I have been using these (Day and Night Serum) for a short time now. While I haven’t seen a difference in deep wrinkles I have seen a diminished fine lines, puffiness, and dull skin. I received them as a sample in exchange for an honest review. I thought because of this I would see no results, I was pleasantly surprised. It goes on easy/ smooth and has a light pleasant scent. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave a residue.I have been adding them to my daily skincare regimen I will continue to use it and see if it helps with the wrinkles. Lastly, I love natural ingredients!
Review Title: Good stuff!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Town & Anchor - Natural Activated Charcoal Detoxifying Facial Cleanser
Review Date: 2015/10/12
Store: Town & Anchor
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Town & Anchor', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.6 x 4.4 inches; 11.2 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been using this for a short time now. I have seen diminished fine line and large pores, my skin feels clean but not stripped or dry, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I received this as a TEST in exchange for an honest review. I thought because of this I would see no results, I was pleasantly surprised. It goes on easy/ smooth, is easy to use and has a light pleasant scent. I have been adding it to my daily skincare regimen.
Review Title: AWESOMENESS!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Graydon [Clinical Luxury] - Natural Super Dry Skin Kit
Review Date: 2016/03/01
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 4.3 x 4.2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709438381'}
Review Text: Greydon skin kit (I actually received them individual- Element Sun Compl., Rich Berry Eye, The Putty, Hair Smoothie ) I have been using all these for a short time now. While I haven’t seen a difference dramatically, BUT I do have very sensitive skin and found relief with this so far, which is AMAZING!. They all go on easy/ smooth and have light pleasant scents. I have been adding them to my daily skincare regimen I will continue to use it and see if it helps (additionally I will have my daughter who has problem with non-natural products test it as well).
Review Title: works good!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shamanuti - Organic Pumpkin Enzyme Masque (4 fl oz / 118 ml)
Review Date: 2016/03/01
Store: Shamanuti ©
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 2.3 x 1.8 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709443323'}
Review Text: I do like Shamanuti products, they smell great and normally work really well. However this on did dry my skin and it felt burnt after use. I'm not sure what it is that bothered my skin but I cannot use this one.
Review Title: not for me
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: schaf - All Natural/Vegan Nutritive Daily Moisturizer (1.7 oz / 50 ml)
Review Date: 2016/05/08
Store: schaf
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Schaf', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 1.9 x 1.8 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168314498 741755519958'}
Review Text: I just discovered Schaf products, and all I can say is they are AMAZING!!!! THEY WORK SO WELL! I love the natural and gentle ingredients! This has a nice light scent, applies well, and leaves skin moisturized and soft!
Review Title: New fave'
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: schaf - All Natural / Vegan White Lava Purifying Scrub (3.38 oz / 100 ml)
Review Date: 2016/05/08
Store: schaf
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Schaf', 'Item Volume': '120 Milliliters', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 1.9 x 1.9 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '741755519941 798167134477'}
Review Text: I discovered Schaf products just recently and I'm totally in love! I love the fact that these are natural AND vegan! They work well without the harsh chemicals. This scrub is perfect for me, nice light scent, not-over-drying, scrubs just enough to clean but not irritate the skin, and rinses clean without any film/ residue left.
Review Title: New fave' scrub!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Natural/Organic Focus**: Predominant preference for products that are organic, vegan, and made from natural ingredients.
- **Sensitive Skin**: Purchaser consistently seeks products gentle on sensitive skin, avoiding irritants and harsh chemicals.
- **Effective Results**: Values effectiveness, particularly seeking improvements in fine lines, puffiness, and overall skin texture.
- **Light Scents**: Generally prefers light, pleasant scents, though there is some hesitation towards stronger fragrances.
- **Brand Loyalty**: Shows emerging loyalty towards specific brands, particularly those that align with the natural and gentle product ethos (e.g., HANA, Worker B, Schaf).
- **Skincare Regimen**: Integrates products into a consistent daily skincare routine, indicating a commitment to skincare.
- **Testing New Products**: Willing to try new products, indicated by testing various items within the same brand or category.
- **Mixed Experiences**: Occasionally experiences dissatisfaction with specific products (e.g., sensitivity issues), but generally maintains a positive view towards natural skincare solutions.

Overall, this individual demonstrates a clear inclination towards natural, effective skincare products that cater to sensitive skin, valuing both quality and the overall user experience.
